description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年至楚汉时期的军事家、政治家，西楚开国君主。楚国名将项燕之孙，被誉为“羽之神勇，千古无二”。
description.en: A military leader and statesman during the late Qin dynasty and the Chu–Han Contention, and the founding monarch of the Western Chu. He was the grandson of the famous Chu general Xiang Yan and is acclaimed for his unparalleled valor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的叔父，秦末民变时期的重要领袖，任楚国武信君，在定陶之战中被秦将章邯所杀。
description.en: Xiang Yu's uncle, a major leader during the uprisings at the end of the Qin dynasty. He served as Lord Wuxin of Chu and was killed by the Qin general Zhang Han at the Battle of Dingtao.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝，在楚汉战争中击败项羽，统一天下。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han dynasty, who defeated Xiang Yu in the Chu–Han Contention and unified China.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的爱人，常在文艺作品中被描绘为在垓下之战中自刎殉情。
description.en: Xiang Yu's beloved consort, often depicted in artistic works as having committed suicide during the Battle of Gaixia to be with him in death.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期楚国名将，项羽的祖父。
description.en: A famous general of the Chu state during the late Warring States period, and the grandfather of Xiang Yu.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的主要谋士，被尊称为“亚父”，后因不受信任而离开。
description.en: Xiang Yu's chief advisor, who was honored with the title 'Second Father'. He later left after losing Xiang Yu's trust.

description.zh-cn: 楚怀王之孙，被项梁拥立为楚王，后被项羽尊为义帝并派人杀害。
description.en: The grandson of King Huai of Chu, he was installed as the King of Chu by Xiang Liang. He was later honored as Emperor Yi by Xiang Yu, who then had him assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年将领，在巨鹿之战后率部投降项羽，被封为雍王。
description.en: A general of the late Qin dynasty who surrendered to Xiang Yu after the Battle of Julu and was enfeoffed as the King of Yong.

description.zh-cn: 楚后怀王任命的上将军，在援救赵国途中因迟滞不前被项羽所杀。
description.en: The Grand General appointed by King Huai II of Chu. He was killed by Xiang Yu for his hesitation while on a mission to rescue the Zhao state.

description.zh-cn: 原为项羽部下，后投奔刘邦，成为汉初三杰之一，在楚汉战争中发挥了关键作用。
description.en: Originally a subordinate of Xiang Yu, he later defected to Liu Bang and became one of the 'Three Heroes of the early Han dynasty', playing a crucial role in the Chu-Han Contention.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝最后一位统治者，向刘邦投降后被项羽所杀。
description.en: The last ruler of the Qin dynasty, who was executed by Xiang Yu after surrendering to Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的叔父，在鸿门宴上保护了刘邦，使其免于被刺杀。
description.en: Xiang Yu's uncle who protected Liu Bang at the Feast at Hong Gate, saving him from assassination.

description.zh-cn: 秦末民变中的一场关键战役。项羽率领的楚军以少胜多，大破章邯、王离率领的秦军主力，奠定了其在反秦力量中的领袖地位。
description.en: A decisive battle during the uprisings at the end of the Qin dynasty. The Chu army led by Xiang Yu defeated the main Qin forces led by Zhang Han and Wang Li despite being heavily outnumbered, establishing his leadership among the anti-Qin rebels.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝灭亡后，项羽领导的西楚与刘邦领导的汉为争夺中国统治权而进行的一场大规模战争。
description.en: A large-scale war fought between Western Chu, led by Xiang Yu, and Han, led by Liu Bang, for supremacy over China after the fall of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统的封建王朝，由秦始皇建立。
description.en: The first unified feudal dynasty in Chinese history, established by Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝灭亡后，由项羽建立的政权，定都彭城。
description.en: A state established by Xiang Yu after the fall of the Qin dynasty, with its capital at Pengcheng.

description.zh-cn: 项羽在鸿门举行的宴会，意图在席间刺杀刘邦，但最终未能成功。
description.en: A banquet hosted by Xiang Yu at Hong Gate with the intention of assassinating Liu Bang, which ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 楚汉战争中的一场著名战役，项羽率领三万精兵击溃了刘邦的五十六万大军。
description.en: A famous battle in the Chu-Han Contention where Xiang Yu led 30,000 elite soldiers to defeat Liu Bang's army of 560,000.

description.zh-cn: 楚汉战争的决战，项羽在此战中被刘邦领导的联军彻底击败，最终突围至乌江自刎。
description.en: The final and decisive battle of the Chu-Han Contention, where Xiang Yu was utterly defeated by the coalition forces led by Liu Bang, ultimately leading to his suicide at the Wu River after breaking out.

description.zh-cn: 楚国地名，位于今江苏省宿迁市，是项羽的出生地。
description.en: A location in the state of Chu, located in modern-day Suqian, Jiangsu Province. It is the birthplace of Xiang Yu.

description.zh-cn: 项羽在垓下之战兵败后突围至此，最终自刎的地方。
description.en: The place where Xiang Yu committed suicide after breaking through the encirclement following his defeat at the Battle of Gaixia.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝的皇宫，位于首都咸阳。
description.en: The imperial palace of the Qin dynasty, located in the capital city of Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 虞姬是项羽的妻子（或爱妾）。
description.en: Consort Yu was Xiang Yu's wife (or beloved consort).

description.zh-cn: 项羽是楚国名将项燕之孙。
description.en: Xiang Yu was the grandson of the famous Chu general Xiang Yan.

description.zh-cn: 项梁是项羽的叔父，并在其年幼时抚养他。
description.en: Xiang Liang was Xiang Yu's uncle and raised him in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 在起兵初期，项羽担任其叔父项梁的裨将。
description.en: In the early stages of the rebellion, Xiang Yu served as a subordinate general to his uncle Xiang Liang.

description.zh-cn: 在历时四年的楚汉战争中，项羽与刘邦为争夺天下而成为主要对手。
description.en: During the four-year Chu–Han Contention, Xiang Yu and Liu Bang were the main rivals for control of China.

description.zh-cn: 范增是项羽最主要的谋士，被尊称为“亚父”。
description.en: Fan Zeng was Xiang Yu's most important advisor, honored with the title 'Second Father'.

description.zh-cn: 项梁采纳范增的建议，寻找到楚怀王的后人熊心，并拥立其为王，即楚后怀王，以争取民心。
description.en: Adopting Fan Zeng's advice, Xiang Liang found Xiong Xin, a descendant of King Huai of Chu, and enthroned him as king (King Huai II of Chu) to win popular support.

description.zh-cn: 因上将军宋义在援赵途中滞留不前，项羽矫诏将其杀死，夺取了军队的领导权。
description.en: Because Grand General Song Yi halted his advance while marching to relieve Zhao, Xiang Yu killed him under a false edict and seized command of the army.

description.zh-cn: 项羽领导起义军反抗秦朝统治，并在巨鹿之战中歼灭秦军主力，最终导致秦朝灭亡。
description.en: Xiang Yu led rebel forces against the Qin dynasty, annihilating its main army at the Battle of Julu, which ultimately led to the dynasty's collapse.

description.zh-cn: 巨鹿之战的决定性胜利，使项羽成为各路诸侯军队的实际统帅，即“诸侯上将军”。
description.en: The decisive victory at the Battle of Julu established Xiang Yu as the de facto commander-in-chief of the allied rebel forces, the 'Grand General of the Feudal Lords'.

description.zh-cn: 在巨鹿之战后，秦将章邯率领其二十万部队向项羽投降。
description.en: After the Battle of Julu, the Qin general Zhang Han surrendered to Xiang Yu with his 200,000 troops.

description.zh-cn: 项羽进入咸阳后，杀死了已向刘邦投降的秦朝末代君主子婴。
description.en: After entering Xianyang, Xiang Yu executed Ziying, the last ruler of the Qin dynasty, who had already surrendered to Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 项羽进入咸阳后，纵火焚烧了秦朝的宫室，大火持续三个月。
description.en: Upon entering Xianyang, Xiang Yu set fire to the Qin imperial palaces, and the fire reportedly lasted for three months.

description.zh-cn: 灭秦后，项羽分封天下，自立为“西楚霸王”，建立西楚政权。
description.en: After destroying Qin, Xiang Yu divided the empire, proclaimed himself 'Hegemon-King of Western Chu', and established the Western Chu state.

description.zh-cn: 项羽先是尊楚后怀王为“义帝”，将其架空，随后将其流放并暗中派人杀害。
description.en: Xiang Yu first honored King Huai II of Chu as 'Emperor Yi' to sideline him, then exiled and secretly assassinated him.

description.zh-cn: 在彭城之战中，项羽亲率三万精兵，大破刘邦五十六万联军。
description.en: At the Battle of Pengcheng, Xiang Yu personally led 30,000 elite troops to crush Liu Bang's coalition army of 560,000.

description.zh-cn: 在垓下之战中，刘邦指挥的汉军联军将项羽的楚军重重包围并最终击败，导致项羽自刎身亡。
description.en: At the Battle of Gaixia, the coalition forces commanded by Liu Bang surrounded and ultimately defeated Xiang Yu's Chu army, leading to Xiang Yu's suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在鸿门宴上，项伯起身以身体掩护刘邦，使其免于被项庄刺杀。
description.en: At the Feast at Hong Gate, Xiang Bo shielded Liu Bang with his body, protecting him from being assassinated by Xiang Zhuang.

description.zh-cn: 韩信最初在项羽军中担任执戟郎，因不被重用而离开。
description.en: Han Xin initially served as a halberd-bearer in Xiang Yu's army but left because he was not given significant responsibilities.
